data.body: Add an embedded read-only terminal panel (VS Code style, bottom of page) that spawns Claude CLI to execute work on a bead. Uses xterm.js for rendering, SSE for streaming process output, and in-memory session management on the server. Includes a 'Ship' button per bead row.
data.description: Add an embedded read-only terminal panel (VS Code style, bottom of page) that spawns Claude CLI to execute work on a bead. Uses xterm.js for rendering, SSE for streaming process output, and in-memory session management on the server. Includes a 'Ship' button per bead row.
data.title: Ship Now - Embedded Terminal
